title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added new secret scanning pattern for `ec_private_key`.
Updated CTA parameters in style guide and added `cta-builder` helper tool.
Added `INPUT_FILES` env var to `get-changed-files` GitHub Action.
Allow-listed hero images for orphaned file deletion checks.
Made data table schemas dynamically registered.
Added carousel component to bespoke landing pages.
summary:
- Added new secret scanning pattern for `ec_private_key`.
- Updated CTA parameters in style guide and added `cta-builder` helper tool.
- Added `INPUT_FILES` env var to `get-changed-files` GitHub Action.
- Converted JavaScript files to TypeScript (e.g., `utils.js` → `utils.ts`).
- Allow-listed hero images for orphaned file deletion checks.
- Made data table schemas dynamically registered.
- Added carousel component to bespoke landing pages.

original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added new secret scanning pattern for `ec_private_key`.
- Updated CTA parameters in style guide and added `cta-builder` helper tool.
- Added `INPUT_FILES` env var to `get-changed-files` GitHub Action.
- Converted JavaScript files to TypeScript (e.g., `utils.js` → `utils.ts`).
- Allow-listed hero images for orphaned file deletion checks.
- Made data table schemas dynamically registered.
- Added carousel component to bespoke landing pages.

### Title
Add secret scanning pattern, update CTA schema, and migrate JS to TS
